title: Kayn crash?
body: Everytime I play Kayn my pc crashes or shuts down and restarts immediatley. I don't know whats going on as I have no other problem with any other champion, it seems as though I load into the game, buy my items, and when the gate opens I proceed to my first buff for a leash and bam, crash and then they remake the game. I dont want to have a leave penalty or a ban. Is there any help I can get? Is it on my end? Can a riot employee or someone take a look at my files and see if anything is wrong?

replies.body: I won't be able to personally look through those files for you, but I think you're actually on the right track. Try running a quick repair through the game client options since there might be some file related to Kayn or the jungle causing those crashes.
